reason: The text describes an overdose event, which is a serious medical emergency. While the person survived, the potential for fatality is high.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD last night. Scariest thing ever. Narcan worked, thank God. Please, learn the signs and carry it if you can. It saves lives. Seriously shaken.
reason: Witnessing an overdose and the potential for future occurrences suggest a moderate level of risk and potential for vicarious trauma.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Just got out of the hospital after OD'ing. Scared straight. Never thought it would happen to me. If you're struggling, please reach out to someone. It's not worth it.
reason: The text indicates a recent overdose (OD'ing), which is a serious event. While the person expresses a desire to change and encourages others to seek help, the recent overdose suggests ongoing vulnerability and potential for relapse.

title: User Story: Overdose
